content: By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers October 18, 2021 10-Minute Sales Research with True Competitor Competitive Research | Moz Tools Last month, Moz launched our True Competitor beta to help you reveal your search rivals. Today, Dr. Pete shows you how to use this new tool to quickly understand your brand’s competitive landscape when researching a prospect. Read this post By: Travis McKnight October 4, 2021 What if the Competition Is Wrong? How to Avoid the Pitfalls of Competitive Content Research Competitive Research | Content Marketing To prevent turning your brand into a cautionary tale, you need to carefully choose what competitors you research, locate relevant pain points, and determine how effective their marketing strategy is. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers September 29, 2021 Reveal Your Rivals with True Competitor Moz Tools | Competitive Research Today, after years of rethinking how competitive analysis should work (and, honestly, re-rethinking it on many occasions), we’re proud to announce the next step in Moz’s competitive analysis toolkit — True Competitor. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers May 7, 2021 Google Advanced Search Operators for Competitive Content Research Search Engines | Competitive Research Without an organizing principle, a spreadsheet full of keywords is a bottomless to-do list. It’s not enough to know what your competitors are ranking for — you need to know what content is powering those rankings and how you’re currently competing with that content. Enter advanced search operators. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers April 21, 2021 Long Tail SEO in 2021: How You Can Have It All or Die Trying Keyword Research | Advanced SEO | Competitive Research Due to Google’s advancements in Natural Language Processing, the long tail of search has exploded. However, I will argue that NLP has also imploded the long tail, and understanding how and why may save our collective sanity. Read this post By: Carly Schoonhoven February 12, 2021 Impactful SEO Audits for B2B Whiteboard Friday | Technical SEO | Competitive Research A comprehensive audit of your B2B website can mean the difference between winning new clients and losing them to the competition. In this brand new episode of Whiteboard Friday, guest host Carly Schoonhoven walks you through four areas that can take your audits to the next level. Read this post By: Joyce Collardé December 18, 2020 SEO Competitive Analysis for B2B — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Competitive Research In our last Whiteboard Friday episode before 2021, guest presenter Joyce Collardé of Obility walks you through how to conduct a competitive SEO audit, helping you address your improvement areas and surpass your competition in the SERPs. Read this post By: Heather Physioc October 13, 2020 Competitive Advantage in a Commoditized Industry Competitive Research | Marketing Industry | Branding In a world where search companies are a dime a dozen and brands tout bland "unique selling propositions" that aren't unique at all, how can you avoid drowning in the sea of sameness? What are you doing that's any different from every other SEO firm? In this article, you'll learn how to find, activate, and articulate your competitive advantage. You’ll discover how to identify unique st... Read this post By: Miriam Ellis June 9, 2020 Mapping Local Essentials: Being the Business that Grows, Sells, or Markets the Beans Local SEO | Competitive Research | E-Commerce SEO Where there’s need, fulfilment can be a public good, and where there’s upheaval, any possibility is worth considering. Necessities are emerging in bold relief on the map of each town and city. Demand must be met by determined small entrepreneurs to keep society functional. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin February 21, 2020 Which of My Competitor's Keywords Should (& Shouldn't) I Target? - Best of Whiteboard Friday Keyword Research | Whiteboard Friday | Competitive Research Which of your competitor's keywords are worth targeting, and which can be ignored? Learn how to tell the difference in this fan favorite Whiteboard Friday. Plus, save a seat our upcoming webinar, Competitive Analysis for SEO: Size Up & Surpass Your Search Rivals! Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard October 18, 2019 Intro to SEO Competitive Analysis 101 Competitive Research | SEO Analytics | Whiteboard Friday In this Whiteboard Friday, Cyrus walks you through how to perform a full competitive analysis, including how to identify your true competitors , keyword gap analysis, link gap analysis, top content analysis, and a brand-new guide from Moz all about analyzing your SEO competition. Read this post By: Roger MozBot June 17, 2019 SEO Whitepaper: How Distance and Intent Shape a Local Pack Competitive Research | Search Engines | Marketing Industry When every SERP is a local SERP, understanding how Google creates them is essential — which is why we’re unpacking the local pack. Read this post By: Roger MozBot May 28, 2019 Uncover How You Stack Up in the Local Search Landscape Local SEO | Advanced SEO | Competitive Research Sometimes, it’s not about increasing traffic to your website. Sometimes, it’s about getting people through your physical door.
